# Interactive component

<h2>This is the sample</h2>

<h4>NOTE: If you need to look up and find your district, please refer to [New York City Department of Education Regional Map](https://video.eschoolsolutions.com/udocs/DistrictMap.pdf)</h4>

MANHATTAN: ORANGE

BROOKLYN: BLUE

BRONX: GREEN

QUEENS: PINK

STATEN ISLAND: PURPLE

<meta charset="utf-8">

<style>

.background {
  fill: #eee;
  opacity: 0;
  pointer-events: all;
}

.map-layer {
  fill: #fff;
  stroke: #aaa;
}

.effect-layer{
  pointer-events:none;
}

text{
  font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  font-weight: 300;
}

text.big-text{
  font-size: 20px;
  font-weight: 400;
}

.effect-layer text, text.dummy-text{
  font-size: 12px;
}

</style>
<script src="http://d3js.org/d3.v3.min.js"></script>
<svg></svg>
<script>

var width = 960,
    height = 500,
    centered;

// Define color scale
var color = d3.scale.linear()
  .domain([1, 20])
  .clamp(true)
  .range(['#fff', '#409A99']);

var projection = d3.geo.mercator()
  .scale(40000)
  .center([-73.935200, 40.730600])
  .translate([width / 2, height / 2]);

var path = d3.geo.path()
  .projection(projection);

// Set svg width & height
var svg = d3.select("svg")
  .attr('width', width)
  .attr('height', height);

// Add background
svg.append('rect')
  .attr('class', 'background')
  .attr('width', width)
  .attr('height', height)
  .on('click', clicked);

var g = svg.append('g');

var effectLayer = g.append('g')
  .classed('effect-layer', true);

var mapLayer = g.append('g')
  .classed('map-layer', true);

var dummyText = g.append('text')
  .classed('dummy-text', true)
  .attr('x', 10)
  .attr('y', 30)
  .style('opacity', 0);

var bigText = g.append('text')
  .classed('big-text', true)
  .attr('x', 20)
  .attr('y', 45);

var bigText2 = g.append('text')
  .classed('big-text', true)
  .attr('x', 20)
  .attr('y', 65);

// Load map data
d3.json('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/alexjalali/remotelearningedav/main/School%20Districts.geojson', function(error, mapData) {
  var features = mapData.features;

  // Update color scale domain based on data
  color.domain([0, d3.max(features, length)]);

  // Draw each province as a path
  mapLayer.selectAll('path')
      .data(features)
    .enter().append('path')
      .attr('d', path)
      .attr('vector-effect', 'non-scaling-stroke')
      .style('fill', fillFn)
      .on('mouseover', mouseover)
      .on('mouseout', mouseout)
      .on('click', clicked);
});

function dist(d){
  return d && d.properties ? d.properties.school_dist : null;
}

function length(d){
  var n = dist(d);
  return n ? n.length : 0;
}

function fillFn(d){
  if(dist(d) == "1") return "orange";
  if(dist(d) == "2") return "orange";
  if(dist(d) == "3") return "orange";
  if(dist(d) == "4") return "orange";
  if(dist(d) == "5") return "orange";
  if(dist(d) == "6") return "orange";
  if(dist(d) == "31") return "purple";
  if(dist(d) == "7") return "green";
  if(dist(d) == "8") return "green";
  if(dist(d) == "9") return "green";
  if(dist(d) == "10") return "green";
  if(dist(d) == "11") return "green";
  if(dist(d) == "12") return "green";
  if(dist(d) == "24") return "pink";
  if(dist(d) == "25") return "pink";
  if(dist(d) == "26") return "pink";
  if(dist(d) == "27") return "pink";
  if(dist(d) == "28") return "pink";
  if(dist(d) == "29") return "pink";
  if(dist(d) == "30") return "pink";
  return color(length(d));
}

// When clicked, zoom in
function clicked(d) {
  var x, y, k;

  // Compute centroid of the selected path
  if (d && centered !== d) {
    var centroid = path.centroid(d);
    x = centroid[0];
    y = centroid[1];
    k = 4;
    centered = d;
  } else {
    x = width / 2;
    y = height / 2;
    k = 1;
    centered = null;
  }

  // Highlight the clicked province
  mapLayer.selectAll('path')
    .style('fill', function(d){return centered && d===centered ? 'yellow' : fillFn(d);});

  // Zoom
  g.transition()
    .duration(750)
    .attr('transform', 'translate(' + width / 2 + ',' + height / 2 + ')scale(' + k + ')translate(' + -x + ',' + -y + ')');
}

function mouseover(d){
  // Highlight hovered province
  d3.select(this).style('fill', 'blue');

  // Draw effects
  bigText
    .style('font-family', 'Helvetica Neue')
    .text("District " + dist(d));
  bigText2
    .style('font-family', 'Helvetica Neue')
    .text("Remote Learing Percentage " + dist(d));
}

function mouseout(d){
  mapLayer.selectAll('path')
    .style('fill', function(d){return centered && d===centered ? 'yellow' : fillFn(d);});
  effectLayer.selectAll('text').transition().style('opacity', 0).remove();

  // Clear province name
  bigText.text('');
  bigText2.text('');
}
</script>
```
